articles.title: Europe Is Looking for a New Cargo Supply Spaceship Capable of Carrying Two Tons to Space - autoevolution
articles.description: Given how astronauts launching and returning to and from the International Space Station (ISS) tend to always to steal the spotlight, it's easy to f...
articles.content: At the time of writing, the space station is being supplied by several spaceships, the most prominent of the bunch being the SpaceX Dragon and the Russian Soyuz. Several others, like the Northrop Gru… [+2128 chars]
